Name: Blazeheart Berserker
Story Background: Hailing from the volcanic mountains, the Blazeheart Berserkers are known for their fiery temper and unmatched combat prowess.
Ability: Whenever Blazeheart Berserker attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Mountain you control.
Appearance Description: The Blazeheart Berserker is a fierce warrior with flaming red hair and eyes, wielding a massive two-handed sword that crackles with fiery energy.
